spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is maintained, but door orientations (especially the bathroom) are incorrect. The balcony window/door configuration is simplified and lacks the depth shown in the 2D plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Significant structural deviations: The kitchen partition wall is too short; the utility room is combined with the foyer area incorrectly; the foyer entrance door is placed on the side rather than the bottom wall.

furniture_mapping.notes: Bed, sofa, and dining table positions are accurate. The dining table changed from 2-chair to 4-chair, and the kitchen appliances are simplified.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Professional isometric render with consistent lighting and clean geometry. The orthographic projection is well-executed.

detected_errors.description: Main entrance door misplaced on the side wall rather than the bottom foyer wall.
Bathroom door swings into the living area instead of into the bathroom as shown in the plan.
The kitchen-to-living room partition wall is significantly shorter than the plan indicates.
Hallucinated full-height door leading to the utility area where only an opening/low wall was specified.
Missing the specific wardrobe closet geometry in the bedroom corner.
